GSD.description:
drm/amd/display: Adjust downscaling limits for dcn314

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.13 by commit 7dbd205349f1fb098057c28a9a2af244aa868f72. For more details please see the references link.
